text: Under the night sky, the tavern is filled with the scent of alcohol mixed with rowdy laughter.
In the corner, a ragged old man is being shoved around by two burly men.
Burly Man A: Old geezer! Drinking without paying? Daring to mess with us?
Burly Man B: Maybe tonight we’ll just throw you out on the street to feed the dogs!
Old Man (weakly): Once I... once I find that thing, I’ll surely repay you...

options.text: Option A: Step forward to intervene (Charisma Check DC 5)]
Option B: Sneak to the back (Dexterity Check DC 9)
Option C: Wait and seek help from the mysterious sorceress
Option D: Strike directly (Strength Check DC11)
